Agency: Labor Department Wage and Hour Division
Info Source: March 7, 2017 download of a dataset posted by the Wage and Hour Division at https://enforcedata.dol.gov/views/data_summary.php
Notes: Date and year are the Findings End Date in the dataset posted by the Wage and Hour Division, which does not provide case opening or closing dates. The company name is the Legal Name provided by the dataset unless that field is blank, in which case the Trade Name is used. The dataset provides only one address and does not indicate whether it is the company headquarters address or the establishment address. The penalty amount is the total of civil monetary penalties and mandated back wages. The original dataset provides a breakdown.

Court: Superior Court of State of California, County of San Francisco
Private Litigation Case Title: CAREN BUFIL et al VS. DOLLAR FINANCIAL GROUP INC et al
Info Source: https://www.sec.gov/Archives/edgar/data/1271625/000095012310082683/w79659e10vk.htm
Notes: Although a court filing listed the maximum settlement amount as $1.8 million, the company disclosed in an SEC filing that it had recorded a charge of approximately $1.5 million in connection with the case.

Info Source: https://www.sec.gov/Archives/edgar/data/1271625/000089322007003609/w42026e10vq.htm
Notes: The company announced in an SEC filing that it had settled three wage and hour cases that had been filed in California Superior Court but did not provide full details on the cases.
